fields.name: Failed_Digit_Error_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The first 4 digits entered do not match the {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}.

Please press Next and enter the first 4 digits again

OR

Go back and select Pending and the booking can be completed by the office or the customer, if the customer would like to use a different card to call up HQ, before selecting Accept or Pending

fields.name: FaultScreenMessage
fields.fieldText:
For the Account {!var_AccountData.Name} a standard Account Rate card: {!var_Account_Rate_Card_Standard.Name} was found, but there is no Trade Rate Card attached to it.

Please contact the office so they can fix this and take a screenshot of this message to give to them.
